properties.Name: ChannelPromotionProduct
properties.Description: The Product(s) offered by Channel in conjunction with Promotion(s) for the period indicated.

Columns.Name: ChannelId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Channel.

Columns.Name: PromotionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The effective start or period start date for the associated offering promotion.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The effective end or period end date for the associated offering promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionNote
Columns.Description: A comment, note or additional information regarding the associated offering promotion.
